ComicInfo.Title: Chapter One: Ingredients; Bad Memory; The Diagnosis; Karma
ComicInfo.Summary:
Former cereal advertising mascot Dougie dies. His one-time colleagues hold an informal wake in a bar, and Carbunkle is particularly disturbed.
Rex Jacoby and crew encounter a monster.
A patient has some usual symptoms
Kimberly throws a vagrant out of the library
Sluggo is repeatedly hit by a bully.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-10 23:40:17. [Issue ID 68640]
ComicInfo.Writer: James Sturm,Donald David,Scott Dikkers,James Sturm,Donald David,Scott Dikkers
